title: P2P Service Test TestBroadcast Needs to Test Round Trip Broadcasting

milestone.title: Backlog
milestone.description: Stuff to do at some later date

body:
Write/improve test for TestBroadcast such that a broadcast is tested to be received by a p2p peer. This involves looking into the libp2p library to determine how to appropriately create hosts in memory for a full test of our broadcast p2p logic. 

See: https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/blob/master/shared/p2p/service_test.go

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 100.0 DAI (100.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it__ as part of the Ethereum Community Fund via ECF Web 3.0 Infrastructure Fund fund__.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/prysmaticlabs/prysm/543/1454). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/prysmaticlabs/prysm/543/1454). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $43,885.34 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)

Hi @prestonvanloon,
Is this issue still open ? I would like to look in it if nobody is working on it.
Thanks.
@PumpkingWok I believe this is still open
@PumpkingWok - don't forget to apply for work on the Gitcoin Issue Details page if you're interested!
@PumpkingWok you are approved to start work :)
